Long Game | San Francisco | Full-time onsite | Senior engineers!

Yo! We’re Long Game — a small startup with enormous plans in San Francisco (~10 folks). We’re pioneering a concept called “Prize-Linked Savings” — encouraging people to set aside money by rewarding them with variable-reward gaming interactions (like a lottery) when they save. We’re looking for great people. In particular, great people with engineering, architecture, and fintech expertise.

If you’re a hybrid of the positions listed on our site — or are just super excited about what we’re doing and want to talk about how you could pitch in — give us a shout! jobs@longgame.co

>>>> http://www.longgame.co/jobs.html <<<<
